name: Orchestrate Session
summary: Open today’s run and generate prompts for Claude Code, Codex, and Grok.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: Overwrite existing prompt files when true.

safety.notes: Writes run prompts only; no external side effects.

name: Run Governed Command
summary: Execute an allowlisted command and log hashed artifacts into the run log.

inputs.name: runner
inputs.description: Runner id (claude-code|codex).

inputs.name: command
inputs.description: Executable name and arguments.

safety.notes: Executes allowlisted commands only and records outputs with hashes.

examples.title: Run git status
examples.expectedOutcome: Creates stdout/stderr/exitcode artifacts and logs them.

name: Sync Upstreams
summary: Print submodule init/status/update commands and record upstream pins.

inputs.name: action
inputs.description: init|status|update.

inputs.name: ref
inputs.description: Ref to pin on update.

safety.notes: Does not execute git commands automatically; prints instructions.

examples.title: Show upstream status
examples.expectedOutcome: Prints current submodule SHAs or not initialized.

name: P1 Routing and Priority
summary: Apply P1 to prioritize objectives and select next transformations.

inputs.name: objective
inputs.description: Current objective.

inputs.name: constraints
inputs.description: Known constraints.

name: DE3 Decompose and Plan
summary: Decompose a problem into ordered, testable steps.

inputs.name: problem
inputs.description: Problem statement.

name: RE2 Retrieve and Ground
summary: Retrieve existing context and ground decisions in evidence.

inputs.name: question
inputs.description: What needs grounding.

name: IN3 Infer and Decide
summary: Infer likely outcomes and make a bounded decision.

inputs.name: options
inputs.description: Decision options.

name: SY8 Synthesize and Ship
summary: Synthesize outputs into a coherent deliverable.

inputs.name: inputs
inputs.description: Inputs to synthesize.

name: SY1 Integrated Run
summary: Integrate the core transformations into an end-to-end run.

inputs.name: goal
inputs.description: Overall goal.

sets_parameters.rule: Cycle primitives until coherence gate passes.

name: Coding Standards
summary: Apply a consistent coding standards checklist to a change set.

inputs.name: changeSet
inputs.description: Description or diff context to review.

examples.title: Manual review
examples.invocation: Apply coding-standards checklist to PR context

name: Security Review
summary: Perform a manual security review pass focused on failure modes.

inputs.name: scope
inputs.description: System or change scope to review.

examples.title: Manual review
examples.invocation: Run a security review on the change description
examples.expectedOutcome: A list of failure modes and mitigations.

name: TDD Workflow
summary: Guide a test-first workflow with incremental red/green/refactor steps.

inputs.name: feature
inputs.description: Feature or change to implement.

examples.title: Manual workflow
examples.invocation: Create a TDD plan for the requested change

name: Verification Loop
summary: Iterate verification steps until confidence threshold is met.

inputs.name: claim
inputs.description: Claim or result to verify.

examples.title: Manual verification
examples.invocation: Run a verification loop on the result
examples.expectedOutcome: A verification log and confidence summary.

name: Iterative Retrieval
summary: Iteratively retrieve and refine context to ground decisions.

inputs.name: question
inputs.description: Question or decision needing context.

outputs.name: retrievalNotes
outputs.description: Iterative retrieval log and grounding summary.

name: Strategic Compact
summary: Condense objectives and constraints into a strategic compact.

inputs.name: objective
inputs.description: Goal or objective to compact.

inputs.name: constraints
inputs.description: Known constraints to include.

examples.title: Manual compact
examples.invocation: Draft a strategic compact for the objective

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: OpenAI model id.

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Prompt or input content.

safety.notes: Networked vendor call; outputs logged and hashed.

examples.title: Single response
examples.expectedOutcome: Creates request/response artifacts and logs hashes.
